abstract.p: SafetyTips.com, site that specializes in safety consulting and training, may be near deal to buy APBNews.com, faltering Web site covering crime, justice and safety that sought Chapter 11 federal bankruptcy protection last month; APBNews agrees to be purchased for $950,000, but deal is subject to competition from other bidders and would need approval of federal bankruptcy court (S)

block.p: SafetyTips.com, a site that specializes in safety consulting and training, may be near a deal to buy APBNews.com, a faltering Web site covering crime, justice and safety that sought Chapter 11 federal bankruptcy protection last month. APBNews said it had agreed to be purchased for $950,000, but the deal is subject to competition from other bidders and would need the approval of the federal bankruptcy court in New York. SafetyTips.com, based in Waltham, Mass., and backed by Rare Medium Group and Apollo Management, will provide APB with financing for continuing operations.
